javadoc.text:
*
* Functions for visualizing matrices in a GUI matrices. * *
* NOTE: In some embedded applications there is no GUI or AWT is not supported (like in Android) so excluding * this class is necessary. *
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.text: * Creates a window visually showing the matrix's state. Block means an element is zero. * Red positive and blue negative. More intense the color larger the element's absolute value * is.
